idea-plugin.name: Path Copier
idea-plugin.description:
Copy file paths to clipboard with a single click from the status bar.

Features

  • Copy Absolute Path - copies the full file path
  • Copy Relative Path - copies the path relative to Git repository root (falls back to project root)

Usage

After installation, two icons appear in the status bar (bottom right of the IDE):

  • Click the copy icon for absolute path
  • Click the module icon for relative path
